SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BO_TITLE, BO_NO, BO_WRITER, BO_CONTENT, BO_REGDATE, BO_TYPE FROM BOARD WHERE BO_TYPE = 0 ORDER BY BO_REGDATE DESC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BO_TITLE, BO_NO, BO_WRITER, BO_CONTENT, BO_REGDATE, BO_TYPE FROM BOARD WHERE BO_TYPE = 3 ORDER BY BO_REGDATE DESC )
WHERE RNUM <= 5
